summary: If it sounds too good to be true, it probably is too good to be true
title: The TerraUSD Stablecoin Lunacy Explained
detailed_content:
O
ne of the more ironic parts of the crypto space over the past few years has been stablecoins. Crypto is a bet on dollar (and other fiat currency) devaluation, yet stablecoins choose to peg and therefore derive their value from the dollar. What?
author: Tony Yiu
